sourcesContent: import { AppBar, Toolbar, Button, Box } from '@mui/material' import Logo from '../../assets/logo.png' const Navbar = () => { const scrollTo = (id) => { document.getElementById(id)?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) } return ( Youth association connecting Greek youth with Erasmus+ opportunities for travel, learning, and cultural exchange across Europe. ) } export default Navbar
